triples.evidence: In SPECT, which uses single photon emission
When you multiply the measured signals, you end up with the concentration of the radiotracer squared
You’ll notice I put a green button here, and what I want to show is how you can eliminate the location dependence-meaning the weighting factor no longer depends on the source position
So it seems, at first glance, like SPECT imaging can have a constant weighting factor for these combined measurements
